column4: I have ubuntu 8.04 but still having problems with Java plugin.
I downloaded java from Sun, followed all instruction, tested it and got half of the cartoon working.
Obviously it does not work on web site that requires java.
wow, how come you guys can type so quickly.
you can install it using the package manager
you have all such as Universe, Restricted and Multiverse enabled?
and what was the name of the java plugin you installed?
try the plugin and it should work :)
